definition: to the utmost/in every possible way
variant of 備|备[bei4]
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
to arrive/most/to/until
the utmost care (idiom); to look after sb in every possible way

sentences.english: To let you know how much your thoughtfulness is appreciated .
sentences.chinese: 告诉你，我多么感谢你对我的关怀备至。

sentences.english: An italophile is a perso who greatly admires italy and italian people and cultree.
sentences.chinese: 意大利迷对意大利及其国民和文化推崇备至。

sentences.english: Mother always cares about my studies.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈对我总是关怀备至。

sentences.english: You show consideration for a pregnant �woman.
sentences.chinese: 你对一个怀孕的妇人也体贴备至。

sentences.english: Pair ungho gentleman took good care, zijun was warm.
sentences.chinese: 成浩对子君关心备至，使子君感到温暖。

sentences.english: Care, whole-hearted service, we look forward to seeing you.
sentences.chinese: 关怀备至，用心服务，我们期待着您。

sentences.english: The author acclaims Liu's Styles and Construction of Chinese Architecture and shows the a deep reverence for Mr.
sentences.chinese: 对于刘先生的《中国建筑类型与结构》著述推崇备至。

sentences.english: Some people swear by slightly warmed water with freshly squeezed lemon juice as a refreshing tonic.
sentences.chinese: 一些人也对鲜榨柠檬汁加温水这个配方推崇备至。

sentences.english: No wonder Dai canonizes them to the utmost.
sentences.chinese: 也难怪老戴要对他们推崇备至了。

sentences.english: Through word honor, he took good care visits.
sentences.chinese: 玥藉词探望荣，关怀备至。

sentences.english: When weather changes or physical discomfort will ask people whether they feel hot, show the utmost solicitude.
sentences.chinese: 逢天气剧变或身体不适便嘘寒问暖，关怀备至。

sentences.english: Being an only daughter, Chun-mei was privileged in many years.
sentences.chinese: 作为家中的独女，春梅多年来都受到呵护备至。

sentences.english: My friend am bad to me when I am ill.
sentences.chinese: 我生病时我的同学对我关怀备至。

sentences.english: You are so tender with me. And you’re the sweetest man I know.
sentences.chinese: 你对我温柔备至，你是我所知道的最甜蜜的男人。

sentences.english: It's like, I think a soccer mom usually is considered a caring parent.
sentences.chinese: 我认为“足球妈妈”是那种关怀备至的家长。

sentences.english: To let you know how much your thoughtfulness is appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 告诉你，我多么感谢你对我关怀备至。

definition: the utmost care (idiom); to look after sb in every possible way
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
extremely (placed after verb or adjective)
in every possible way (idiom); meticulous
to enquire solicitously about sb's well-being (idiom)/to pamper
considerate (of other people's needs)
courtesy/deferential treatment/polite reception
to grant whatever is asked for/to accede to every plea
politely/solicitously/eagerly attentive
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
in hundred and one ways/in every possible way/by every means
to dote on sb
to put one's heart (and soul) into sth/with great care
to follow everywhere/to always be there for sb at their beck and call
with all of one's heart
